Melihat Kembali Sumbangsih Alfin Lestaluhu di Timnas Indonesia yang Patut Dikenang
01 Nov 2019, 10:35 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sepak bola Indonesia kembali kehilangan salah satu putra terbaiknya setelah Alfin Lestaluhu meninggal dunia, Kamis (31/10/2019) kemarin. Pemain timnas Indonesia U-16 tersebut meninggal dunia setelah berjuang melawan penyakit ensefalitis (infeksi otak) dengan hypoalbumin.
Berita duka ini pertama kali disampaikan PSSI melalui akun media sosial mereka. "Telah berpulang menghadap Sang Pencipta, Alfin Farhan Lestaluhu. Semoga amal ibadah dan segala kebaikan diterima Tuhan Yang Maha Esa," tulis PSSI di akun Instagramnya.
Kabarnya, Alfin Lestaluhu mulai mengeluh sakit pada kepalanya sejak 29 September 2019. Ia kemudian di bawa ke sebuah rumah sakit di Ambon, Maluku.
PSSI ikut campur tangan dalam pengobatan Alfin Lestaluhu. PSSI berinisiatif membawa Alfin ke Jakarta dan dirawat di RS Royal Progress.
Namun takdir berkata lain. Alfin, salah satu pemain Timnas Indonesia U-16 harus berpulang pada Kamis sekitar pukul 22.00 WIB malam. Berita ini tentu membawa duka mendalam bagi seluruh pencinta sepak bola Tanah Air.
Alfin merupakan salah satu duta bangsa yang yang sempat mengharumkan Indonesia di beberapa kompetisi internasional. Alfin juga mencatatkan rapor yang baik bagi Garuda Muda.
Untuk kembali mengenang kontribusi Alfin Lestaluhu pada sepak bola Indonesia, berikut tim Bola.com merangkum sederet sumbangsih pemain kelahiran Ambon itu untuk sepak bola muda Tanah Air.

Looking Back Alfin Lestaluhu's contribution in the Indonesian National Team that is worth remembering
Nov 1, 2019, 10:35 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian soccer lost again one of its best sons after Alfin Lestaluhu died on Thursday (10/31/2019) yesterday. The Indonesian U-16 national team player died after battling encephalitis (a brain infection) with hypoalbumin.
This sad news was first conveyed by PSSI through their social media accounts. "Has passed away facing the Creator, Alfin Farhan Lestaluhu. May the deeds of worship and all the goodness be received by God Almighty," PSSI wrote on his Instagram account.
Reportedly, Alfin Lestaluhu began complaining of pain in his head since September 29, 2019. He was then taken to a hospital in Ambon, Maluku.
PSSI intervenes in the treatment of Alfin Lestaluhu. PSSI took the initiative to bring Alfin to Jakarta and was treated at Royal Progress Hospital.
But fate said otherwise. Alfin, one of the Indonesian U-16 national team players, had to leave on Thursday at around 22:00 West Indonesia Time. This news certainly brings deep sorrow for all football lovers of the country.
Alfin is one of the nation's ambassadors who had scented Indonesia in several international competitions. Alfin also recorded a good report card for Garuda Muda.
To commemorate Alfin Lestaluhu's contribution to Indonesian soccer, the following Bola.com team summarizes a series of contributions from the Ambon-born player for youth soccer in the country.
